mapper.select: /* AuthMapper.selectAdminUser */ select mem.email as user_id , mem.role_id as user_type , rol.role_nm , mem.member_no , mem.name as user_name , mem.phone , mem.password as password from tb_member mem join tb_role rol on mem.role_id = rol.role_id where mem.role_id = 'ROLE_001' and mem.email = #{adminId}
